item.title:
Elle Fanning and Sarah Paulson are set to star in film ‘I AM SYBIL.’
Based on the true story behind the best-selling book and cultural-sensation case of Sybil, one of the first mainstream cases of dissociative identity disorder.
http://tinyurl.com/2225m825
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Daniel Kaluuya has grossed over $2B at the global box office.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Tom Holland says his upcoming Fred Astaire biopic, which will be directed by PADDINGTON’s Paul King, may begin filming early next year.
He describes the project as a celebration of Astaire’s life and career.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:

item.title: Adam Devine, Pierce Brosnan, Nina Dobrev, and Ellen Barkin star in the trailer for ‘The Out-Laws,’ premiering July 7 on Netflix.

item.title:
Jeremy Allen White says his hair stylist on ‘THE BEAR’ has a Jennifer Coolidge prayer candle.
"I rigged that, because I've had a crush on you… I sent that candle." – Jennifer Coolidge.
item.author: FilmUpdates
